description: Assetto Corsa is an Italian racing simulator that supports VR accessories. Enthusiastic Assetto Corsa players have created several custom applications that allow them to modify and enhance the game, including applications that allow them to add additional shading and lighting effects to tracks and cars. These effects are saved in VAO-PATCH files.

VAO stands for vertex ambient occlusion, which is a technique that can be used to improve shading and lighting effects in games. Players can create VAO-PATCH files using CustomTracksBakery or optiXBakery, load the file into Assetto Corsa using the player-created Content Manager, and apply them to tracks and cars using the Custom Shaders Patch.
